attributes.action: Set all fuel prices to the same level throughout the UK and Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fed up of having to pay different prices for the same fuel in different parts of the country?  Let's get the price of fuel fixed at the same amount country wide - forget about fuel duty - some of us have to work!!  The govenrnment will moan that unemployment figures are up because of these taxes - lets get it sorted.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
